game.shortDescription: 클래식 Plants vs. Zombies가 선명한 HD로 돌아옵니다! 식물과 좀비의 오리지널 전투가 더 크고, 더 밝고, 더 크레이지한 모습으로 돌아왔습니다! 모든 것이 시작된 게임을 리마스터된 멋진 HD 그래픽으로 다시 경험해 보세요. 새로운 비밀 요소도 가득합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The classic Plants vs. Zombies returns in glorious HD! The original battle between Plants and Zombies is back — bigger, brighter, and crazier than ever before! Experience the game that started it all, now remastered with stunning HD graphics and packed with new secrets and content to uncover.

reviewHighlights.text: A remake with a huge amount of potential to be good, made soulless by greed and not letting the original devs help. Mostly not worth the price tag, bu...
two things happened at once in my life, a pretty bad breakup and the release of this game, i think the latter was worse
